meanings.definition: To place a bet in a poker game before seeing one's cards.
meanings.sent1: She anted up before even looking at her hand.
meanings.sent2: Players usually anted before the dealer reveals the community cards.
meanings.sent3: The cat anted up its toy mouse as a bet in the pretend poker game.
meanings.sent4: He anted up his lucky coin, hoping it would bring him good fortune in the game.
meanings.sent5: Anting up early showed confidence in her poker skills.

meanings.definition: To take action in anticipation of something happening.
meanings.sent1: He anted by preparing extra food for the party.
meanings.sent2: The team anted by practicing hard before the championship.
meanings.sent3: She anted by packing an umbrella, expecting rain during the picnic.
meanings.sent4: Anting by setting the alarm early, he ensured he wouldn't be late for the meeting.
meanings.sent5: Anting for the exam, she studied diligently every day.
